title: Ni1mo
author: Ni1mo
content: Invite / Mass DM's ServiceHow does it work?You send me a ready base or send us links to groups. From there, we will collect all users (we can collect by filters.)Then we send out mailings to the database or invite them to your chat (also selling old groups for invite.)Scraping - We collect a database of the target audience from any group (both open and closed) with many filters.Our Service:Invite (without the risk of a group ban) - $30 PER 1000Mass DM (by usernames / numbers / id or chats) - $30 PER 1000Cheat fake members in channels, groups / Views / Reactions / Comments / SharesBUMP your group to the TOP of the search !! MEGA OFFER !!Accounts Market (sessions / Tdata formats) !! ANY GEO !! ( We can create accounts for you, along with customized groups / channels.)Administrate your project ( Autoposter content / Content cloner/ SEO )Selling and support servers / old groups / bots for TGBan channels / chats / bots / accounts. SKAM tagSend reports on channels / groups / bots - $200 PER 1000SPECIFICATIONS:We develop/rent/sell only the TOOL for its use in any case we do NOT include.In addition, we do NOT own or distribute any information about your activities.We work on a 100% PREPAYMENT or use a guarantor service at the expense of the customer.Despite the fact that we do our job competently and correctly -WE CANNOT GUARANTEE that your group will not be banned. We can only minimize the risks!Experience in the market - 3 years.If possible, take orders with correct technical task - this will significantly save the time to complete your order, thanks. *adminWhat are the payment methods?We accept BTC,LTC,ETH or stablecoins.How can I place an order?Contact us HERE on forumor Telegram- @Franceska_Telegio- @beermomâ€‹

comments.author: Gladitorcomeback
comments.body: I am familiar with this kind of DMs and invite and it's just waste of money because it will not bring real investor or active user to the group. These DMs look spam and no body want to join group. Similarly when you add through bot , active users will leave the group while some non active users will remain which only useful if you want to increase number of group members.

comments.author: Ni1mo
comments.body: It all depends on the base and your project. If the project is crap, the person won't be interested and will get out. So you need to add a target audience for your project, if this does not happen, then yes - a waste of time

comments.author: Ni1mo
comments.body: Gentlemens, changed the approach to the invite because of updates Telegram. Now there are only 2 options and they all start with 01. Set project - group / account trust / our server / bots / 2000 invites ( maximum )2. Put the project - a group / account trust / our server / bots + Invite to the long to 200 000 ( maximum)So project for 2 days with 2000 peoples ( invite ) - for 2 days, or on the long - term invite per 100 - 200 invite in 1 day
